name: end-of-life
title: End of Life
description: An extension to bring endoflife.date into Raycast. Get End-of-life (EOL) and support information for various products
author: csigritz

commands.name: index
commands.title: Check End of Life
commands.description: Get EOL dates and support lifecycles on various products and frameworks

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
